name: S0ftW4re.exe
description:
Break the simulation. Save us all.

S0ftW4re.exe is a 3d physics-based first-person stealth game made in Unity and produced for the Buddy Up Game Jam 2023.

The virus is the only hope of destroying the simulation that imprisons humanity. Carry it through the security systems while avoiding the notice of the sentries and bring it to the central database to destroy the simulation.

Design & Programming: Nick Tomsho

Models & Textures: Colorful Frog

Background Music Track "Viral Takeover" by Esteban Garcia Vazquez
